root.name: Awakening: The Goblin Kingdom
root.description: OverviewAwakening: The Goblin Kingdom is a hidden objects game developed by Boomzap and published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.After overcoming the Dreamless Castle and Moonfell Wood, Princess Sophia's quest leads her to the rugged, mountainous snow-peaked Goblin Kingdom. Princess Sophia, the only human seen in over a century in this part of the world, was directed by the Fairy Queen to seek answers from the wise Goblin King about the fate of the rest of her people. But things are not well in the Kingdom and dark shadows await the Princess' arrival in the Goblin Kingdom.
